translations: v.赞扬，欢呼；呼喊，招呼；下冰雹；（大量物体）像雹子般落下（或击打）；<古>表示问候或欢呼欢迎
n.冰雹；雹子般的一阵；招呼（某人）

sentences.sentence: We drove through hail and snow.
sentences.translation: 我们顶着冰雹和大雪开车。

sentences.sentence: Hail was hammering down onto the roof.
It started to hail, huge great stones.
sentences.translation: 天空开始下冰雹，巨大的雹子。
